arts.ttl: Lionel Messi struggles in New York City debut as Inter Miami and NYCFC battle to a 1-1 draw in the Bronx
arts.sum: Off the 161st Street stop on the 4 train in the Bronx, Yankee Stadium's seats flooded in blue and pink shirts as Lionel Messi and Inter Miami took on New York City FC on Saturday afternoon.
